annotations.description: What an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will more of the same in their other games. The home side dominated this game. The hosts displayed good teamplay with a lot of passes. The visiting side patiently waited in their own half to dispossess the opponent and hit them on the break.

A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. Bayern Munich have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
Bernd Leno is alert and has a clear sight of a long through ball from Arjen Robben (Bayern Munich). Easy save!
Arjen Robben (Bayern Munich) goes on a weaving run through the defence and gets within shooting range but his effort is blocked.
Karim Bellarabi (Bayer Leverkusen) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.

Karim Bellarabi (Bayer Leverkusen) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. Manuel Neuer pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Wendell (Bayer Leverkusen) swings in the corner, but it's comfortably cleared away.

Stefan Kiessling (Bayer Leverkusen) receives a precise pass and is given time inside the box to send a promising strike towards the middle of the goal. Manuel Neuer guesses his intention and denies him with a fine save.

Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) is adjudged to have been offside when making his run.

The home side attempts to hold onto the ball for as long as possible, while the away team's main weapon is fast counter attacks.

Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.

What an entertaining encounter between these two teams. Let's hope there will more of the same in their other games. The home side dominated this game. The hosts displayed good teamplay with a lot of passes. The visiting side patiently waited in their own half to dispossess the opponent and hit them on the break.
